title: Textile, 1947-49-24-a/e, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: plain compound satin
creditline: Gift of the Museum of the Cranbrook Academy of Art
description: Part of a chasuble with a design of a central palmette, flowers and foliage in shades of red, blue, green on a silver background. Some leaves in gold. Piece has gold lace trimming.
